title: International bond purchase counts in CFA

content.question: Which of the following transactions is included in the financial account of Country Xâ€™s balance of payments accounts?

choices.label: A firm in Country X sells robots to a firm in Country A.
Country X sends financial aid to Country B.
An individual in Country X receives dividend payments from a firm in Country C.
An individual in Country X sends money monthly to family members in Country D.
An individual in Country X buys new government bonds issued by Country E.

content.answer: An individual in Country X buys new government bonds issued by Country E.

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
